alert.note: Alert for Marion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 10:29PM CDT until May 17 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT MONDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of south central Illinois, including the following county, Marion. * WHEN...Until 430 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1029 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area along State Route 37. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of up to 0.5 inches is possible tonight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kinmundy, Patoka, Omega, Fairman, Tonti, Alma, Vernon and Brubaker. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois near exit 127.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
